DataElement.preferredName: Last Erythrocyte Blood Transfusion Administered Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the last erythrocyte blood transfusion was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._Cell specialized for oxygen transport, having a high concentration of hemoglobin in the cytoplasm and little else; biconcave, anucleate discs, 7nm diameter in mammals._The infusion of components of blood or whole blood into the bloodstream. The blood may be donated from another person, or it may have been taken from the person earlier and stored until needed._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:Cell specialized for oxygen transport, having a high concentration of hemoglobin in the cytoplasm and little else; biconcave, anucleate discs, 7nm diameter in mammals.:The infusion of components of blood or whole blood into the bloodstream. The blood may be donated from another person, or it may have been taken from the person earlier and stored until needed.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A blood cell specialized for oxygen transport, having a high concentration of hemoglobin in the cytoplasm. They are biconcave, anucleate discs, with a 6-8um diameter in humans.
The injection of whole blood or a blood component directly into the bloodstream.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
